title: Silk Sonic, Congressional Reenactment, TIP Harris Comedy, Forbes and more.
itunes:title: Silk Sonic, Congressional Reenactment, TIP Harris Comedy, Forbes and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve just wants to make sure you know something important going into this particular weekend. The Chief Love Officer cannot help but make a recommendation for a lady whose mother and husband are texting too much. The comedians give us a Congressional reenactment. We have a way for you to share an evening with Silk Sonic. Will TIP Harris do well in comedy? Would You Rather got the crew stuck. Forbes list of highest paid entertainers is out. Our favorite gentleman of leisure gives us his final pick for the Big Game. Today the crew end the week with talk about the significance of Valentine's Day and what it shows a woman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
